item.title: How ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Could Make Oscar History and Shatter Anime’s Glass Ceiling
item.description: Is it going to be a golden year for anime at the Oscars? In its 98-year history, the Academy Awards has recognized only a handful of anime titles — and never with more than one nomination per film. Th
